ModMetaData.name: More Inspiration Types
ModMetaData.author: RelaxedOtter
ModMetaData.description:
Adds new inspiration types:
* Farming: increases planting speed by 200% and harvest chance by 75% (or harvest amount by 75% if you have a mod) * Mining: increases mining speed by 200% and mining yield by 75% * Researching: increases research speed by 200%
Because these new inspirations dilute the inspiration pool so you will get the other inspirations less often, they have a higher minimum skill requirement so that you are more likely to get them only on your main pawns that use those skills. The skill requirements are 8.
